name: Sky Taxi: GMO Armageddon
storyline: Apocalyptic mutants are approaching, and the salvation of the world depends on one brave little mouse! Help Mitch fight off the terrible threat looming over the world insidious monsters rising from the Earth! Drive through forests, over mountains, and into secret military bases as you fight off evil mutants! Destroy these evil creatures by using whatever you can find: swords, lasers, bombs, magic wands, and even fire extinguishers. Only the skilled and resourceful can succeed!
summary: Help the courageous mouse Mitch save the world from annihilation once again!
